CustomField.description: Denotes if a user has access to the Rules. Manually checked. specific members have access and there will be the several one-offs which TCH can grant rules access at any time. A badge is added to the Contact record when access is granted. Default unchecked
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Denotes if a user has access to the Rules. Manually checked. Specific members have access and there will be several one-offs which TCH can grant rules access at any time. A badge is added to the Contact record when access is granted. Default unchecked
CustomField.label: Has Rules Access?
